data.title: The War Zone (1999)
data.meta_description: The film takes place in the rural Devon countryside, where a family of four has just moved from London. Events are related from the perspective of 15 year-old Tom, who is unhappy with life away from the city.
data.text: The film takes place in the rural Devon countryside, where a family of four has just moved from London. Events are related from the perspective of 15 year-old Tom, who is unhappy with life away from the city.
